divs: Sighting Detailsnormaly in the afternoon I reach the top of the building were I live, I have aespecial design area to look at the sky. Sudenly I saw somthing that looks likea small stationary sphere at low altitud, sudenly the object begin to move.since the first time i saw the phenomena i took my professional photographydigital camera Canon D60 with a 300 mm. lens making 6 shots in the fine qualitymode, also for 6 min. I filmed. with a canon video digicam mini DV. The pictureshave a extremely high quality and good detail, because de object rotates all thetime. I think after looking the pictures in detail, aplying zoom in my computerthat this is an object with a very advance technology andapearence. forgive my bad English If You like I will send you from E.mailthis information. Also I keep in the compact flash card of my digital camerathe pictures for further or later analysis. This information is real andespectacular. Also you can contact to me, I have some other interesant material.Finally the object disapear with the distance.
